title: Silver Top lane looking for team
body:
Im Silver top laner looking for a 5 man dynamic team. Happy to play tanks/ carries whatever fits team needs. play alot with plat players so handle toxicity well- and would say im better than majority of silver players. i have decent champ pool size so hit me up.. dont let the name fool you xD

pooh

replies.body:
Hey man, add me ingame.
Was silver last season and prefer to play with people that are committed to climb

If you don't tilt easily and keep focus on the game I'd be happy to join you in your quest to make a 5 men team :)

I mainly mid/support (AD, AP, tanks, CC-heavy, depending on compo).
